h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Take the path going right from the wooden beams, and you'll come upon a group of frozen corpses by a raised platform. They'll be smashed to pieces as a new enemy flies down -- a Falcon Fan-Maker.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
Take the path going right from the wooden beams, and you'll come upon a group of frozen corpses by a raised platform. They'll be smashed to pieces as a new enemy flies down -- a Falcon Fan-Maker.
